data.description: Review of topics in electrodynamics and special relativity; ionization and energy loss during scattering of charged particles; radiation from charged particles including Bremstrahlung, Cerenkov, and Synchrotron radiation; Thomson scattering of electromagnetic waves by charged particles. Knowledge of Dynamics [such asE M A 202orPHYSICS 311] and Electromagnetics [such asPHYSICS 322] required.
data.title: INTERACTION OF RADIATION WITH MATTER
